sub_title: Vendor Management - CS - Shared Services - Airbnb alumni

profile_positions.description:
•	Embraced the adventure to become the first partner coordinator for Airbnb taking the opportunity to shape and develop a new role  
•	Developing and maintaining the relationship with partners by playing an integral role managing the day-to-day service delivery 
•	Supporting vendors to drive scorecard performance against SLA’s, participating in business reviews and providing necessary assistance to the vendors to improve metrics if needed
•	Partnering with vendor Team Leads to plan and execute optimization of workforce and workspace management  
•	Knowledge sharing: Being the person with knowledge of "all" procedures and workflows, information & data. Alternatively, know where to find it or who to ask
•	Working in collaboration with leads and agents to prioritize and address issue escalations 
•	Coaching partner leads to perform root cause analysis and resolve complex issues 
•	Motivating agents to challenge the status quo and to look for opportunities to improve process workflows and overall customer experience 
•	Acting as a steward of Airbnb’s core values to bring the company’s culture to the day-to-day services delivered by the partners
•	Working as liaison between vendors and across-functional teams including: Training, QA, IT, WFM, and Customer Voice. 
•	Leading and/or assisting in projects outside of the scope of the vendor management team.
profile_positions.title: Vendor Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
* Providing friendly and efficient service to the worldwide Airbnb community.
* Be a first point of contact to handle and resolve customer complaints.
* Identify and escalate issues appropriately.
* Compose thoughtful and accurate messages or customize prepared responses to customer emails.
* Research information and troubleshoot problems using available resources.
* Arbitrate in situations between users.
* Monitor and control numerous concurrent tasks in tandem.
* Proactively and independently work to meet targets and goals.
* Knowledge of and experience with measuring and improving customer satisfaction and loyalty across broad functional areas and diverse geographies.
profile_positions.title: Customer Experience GX consultant c/o Airbnb

profile_positions.description:
* Main interface between Securities clients and the various Custody Operational units of the Bank (SFS, Securities & Fund Services)
* Proactively monitor clients trading activity, take pro-active responsibility for the resolution of client enquiries within Citi’s published standards - interacting internally with various business partners.
* Investigate client’s issues in cash and securities related transactions including settlement, income, corporate action events, stock lending and general market industry practice.
* Resolution of client enquiries within department standards
* Interface with Citigroup's internal departments, both locally and internationally on behalf of Corporate clients within the following areas; Product and Sales team, Relationship Manager, Corporate Actions, Settlements, Stock Lending, Income, Implementations, etc.
* Prepare/attend to monthly meetings and Bi-weekly conference calls.
profile_positions.title: Senior Client Service Representative

profile_positions.description:
* Adjudicate and process Claims within the agreed company SLA - clear to zero, in accordance with policy benefits to facilitate the company achieving its loss ratio target.
* Use AWC’s client database, Gulliver, accurately and effectively to ensure reports generated give a true reflection of the department’s workload, which consequently facilitates effective target planning
* Operate and meet the company service standards, clear to zero, to guarantee customer satisfaction and retention.
* Contribute to the team and departmental productivity targets so that the agreed SLA is achieved and a high level of customer service is provided.
* In line with the company’s policy on cost containment identify duplicate payments, possible non-disclosure and fraudulent claims.
* Respond to customer enquiries accurately and professionally and if necessary, liaise with other departments for support to ensure an efficient and professional response is given thereby achieving customer satisfaction.
* Medical training to expand knowledge of medical terminology and procedures and to develop comprehensive claims processing skills.
* Awarded by management team for delivering excellent results.
* Trained other team members to provide superior customer support to key clients.
profile_positions.title: Claims Officer

profile_positions.description:
* Provided outstanding B2B customer support to a portfolio of 120 business clients
* Worked in tandem with Sales and Technical teams to provide excellent customer experience 
* Reduced average customer query response time from 48 hrs to 32 hrs
* Responsible for handling escalated customer service queries by phone and email
* Successfully identified and acted upon opportunities to promote and up sell other products and services 
* Awarded with the opportunity to participate in trade shows throughout US and meeting face to face with key clients
profile_positions.title: Customer Services Analyst
